Posts.EditableText:
Hey all been trying to make a great text adventure and wanted to know how every one felt about sounds in game? Do you like sounds when playing a texting or do you prefer to keep it quite? Also how much is too much when it comes to sounds? For instance a stream running while in certain area or birds chirping in a forested area, chopping of a tree then fallen down. Just trying to get a better grip on what users prefer.
Thanks
Mike
